title: When I Go
lyrics:
When I leave here
I'll have no place to go
And it's much too late to change my name
I'm gonna take you with me when I go
I get older

But my troubles don't change

Work so hard with nothing to show

And it's much too late to change my name

I'm gonna take you with me when I go



I'm a stranger

Even to the people I know

And I'm going to where

The winds never change

I'm take you with me when I go



I get older

But my troubles don't change

Work so hard

With nothing to show

And it's much too late

To change my name

Gonna take you with me when I go

Gonna take you with me when I go

Take you with me when I go
